## Matrix.RotationYawPitchRoll() method

Creates a rotation matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationYawPitchRoll(yaw: number, pitch: number, roll: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  yaw | <code>number</code> | defines the yaw angle in radians (Y axis) |
|  pitch | <code>number</code> | defines the pitch angle in radians (X axis) |
|  roll | <code>number</code> | defines the roll angle in radians (X axis) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the new rotation matrix
